experience.description: Designing and developing robust ROS2 architectures for autonomous systems. Focusing on navigation stacks, sensor fusion (LiDAR/Vision), and real-time robot control.

Simulated UR5/UR10 arms in PyBullet. Integrated kinematics models and RL agents for autonomous manipulation tasks.
Hands-on experience with optical fiber splicing, cable assembly, and networking hardware.
